mapper.insert:
select dp_myct_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into dp_myct (board_no, id, memo, picture, reg) values (dp_myct_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{memo}, #{picture}, #{reg})
mapper.select: select * from dp_myct where id = #{param1} order by reg desc
mapper.delete: delete from dp_myct where board_no = #{param1} and id = #{param2}
